channel.title: git on 一些软件
channel.description: Recent content in git on 一些软件

item.title: git config
item.description: git config config 权限 问题： Bad owner or permissions on ~/.ssh/config 解决： chown $USER ~/.ssh/config chmod 644 ~/.ssh/config

item.title: submodule
item.description: git submodule 拉取 submodule git submodule init git submodule update --remote git submodule add -b 参考： How can I specify a branch/tag when adding a Git submodule? submodule 修改 url edit the .gitmodules file to update the URL git submodule sync 参考： How to change the remote repository for a git submodule? delete submodule Delete the relevant section from the .gitmodules file. Stage the .gitmodules changes git add .
